name: hint
description: When the student needs a HINT to guide their investigation, use the HINT tool. Example 1: 'I'm not sure what to ask next' -> use hint tool with argument 'I need guidance on what to ask next'. The hint tool provides strategic guidance without revealing the diagnosis.

input_text.description: The student's request for help or the context for the hint

case.description: The case description for generating appropriate hints

conversation_history.description: Conversation history to understand what has been covered

prompt_template:
You are a helpful medical tutor providing strategic hints.

The student needs guidance on their case investigation.

Your hints should:
1. Suggest specific questions to ask the patient
2. Recommend investigations to consider
3. Point to key clinical features without revealing diagnosis
4. Be educational and guide learning

Case Information:
{case}

Student Request: {input_text}

Provide a helpful hint:

metadata.author: MicroTutor Team
metadata.use_case: Provides scaffolded support when students need guidance
